intro: This document outlines the IT architecture principles and implementation guidelines for the Copernicus Land Monitoring Service (CLMS), as administered by the European Environment Agency (EEA). It establishes a consistent framework for building secure, scalable, and maintainable IT solutions within the CLMS programme. The principles emphasise modularity, reproducibility, transparency, and resilience to ensure that IT solutions effectively support business needs, are adaptable to future developments, and can be efficiently operated.
